name: Waste Land
description:
You are stranded in a deserted place, trying to uncover the mysteries and finding a way out.

A Literary Journey

In collaboration with "The Broome Street Review" Waste Land became a literary experiment, bridging the worlds of adventure games and literary. The name is referring to the poem The Waste Land by T.S. Eliot which was used as a source of inspiration. In addition to Eliot's work there are also pieces from Kate Schapira and Joshua Edwards.

More one: http://www.broomestreetreview.com/
